desc: Hand-crafted 100% soy and coconut wax luxury candles, hand-poured in small batches with the best fragrance oils. We offer a variety of scents each uniquely made and is guaranteed a lit vibe! We also provide beautiful candle vessels and accessories.

layout.text: 2022 is the year for the Queens! That’s why it’s essential to cleanse and purify your space to allow positive flowing energy while promoting relaxation!
